LABEL: 0x1D7
STRING: Contact with the deep-sea cruise submarine <SHEEP III> is lost.

LABEL: 0x20A
STRING: ...58 hours later, August 4th, Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x242
STRING: A clear summer night sky.

LABEL: 0x2D6
STRING: A silver sports car was riding along a coastal road under the starlit sky.

LABEL: 0x324
STRING: The car cruised above the sea at a speed of 60km/h while reflecting the dim streetlights.

LABEL: 0x366
STRING: It was a picturesque scene, but "his" face was grim while sitting in the driver's seat.

LABEL: 0x3A6
STRING: The time was already past three in the morning.

LABEL: 0x3D3
STRING: Even though it was still August, a chilly breeze cut through the bodies of the pedestrians.

LABEL: 0x418
STRING: There were no other cars on the road this late at night.

LABEL: 0x448
STRING: However, "he" was not bothered by the cold weather.

LABEL: 0x48C
STRING: A bead of sweat ran down "his" forehead.

LABEL: 0x4B2
STRING: To tell the truth, "he" didn't even notice the cold wind blowing in through the fully opened window.

LABEL: 0x50A
STRING: Glancing through the clear windshield and at the empty rear mirrors, "his" thoughts were elsewhere.

LABEL: 0x5D1
STRING: "His" mind was still stuck back at his desk.

LABEL: 0x611
STRING: Or, to be precise, it was the message that had arrived earlier that had grabbed "his" thoughts and wouldn't let go.

LABEL: 0x673
STRING: "He" recalled how the pale text had appeared on the monitor as the data was loaded.

LABEL: 0x6BF
STRING: The familiar user interface had never seemed as ominous as it did then.

LABEL: 0x709
STRING: "He" was repeating each word and going over their meaning in his head, like a student trying to memorize a formula.

LABEL: 0x76F
STRING: Even after leaving said desk behind, "he" was still thinking about the text that had been burned to his retinas.

LABEL: 0x82C
STRING: ...Then.

LABEL: 0x849
STRING: Seeing the traffic light in front of "him" turn red, he braked.

LABEL: 0x89D
STRING: "He" was too busy thinking to notice it at first but managed to stop in time.

LABEL: 0x8F9
STRING: "He" patted his chest in relief.

LABEL: 0x921
STRING: This situation was so out of the ordinary that "he" almost forgot.

LABEL: 0x963
STRING: No one else was at the intersection besides "him."

LABEL: 0x993
STRING: Still, it was in "his" nature to obey the traffic lights and signs.

LABEL: 0x9D9
STRING: If someone asked why that was, "he" might tell them it was because "those are the rules."

LABEL: 0xA1B
STRING: It was enough to get them to drop the subject, even if it was just a tautology.

LABEL: 0xA71
STRING: Whether those words were meant more for others or "himself" was anyone's guess.

LABEL: 0xA9B
STRING: The lights switched to green.

LABEL: 0xACB
STRING: "He" slowly stepped on the gas pedal.

LABEL: 0xB12
STRING: 「Just what is going on...?」

LABEL: 0xB3E
STRING: "He" continued along the road with his usual safe driving style.

LABEL: 0xB6C
STRING: Did "he" even realize the words coming out of his mouth?

LABEL: 0xBB4
STRING: The pale message that had appeared on the monitor...

LABEL: 0xBEE
STRING: After thinking over it a few times, the eeriness had worn off, but it was still just as puzzling.

LABEL: 0xC48
STRING: Nevertheless, it hadn't been a suspicious message at all.

LABEL: 0xC7A
STRING: The sender, Katagiri Hitose, was a name "he" knew well.

LABEL: 0xCD0
STRING: 「What on earth was...?」

LABEL: 0xCF0
STRING: The message had contained readings showing the status of <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xD39
STRING: Time-stamped data, presumably recorded after the accident.

LABEL: 0xD79
STRING: Power levels, ambient sea temperature, internal atmospheric pressure...

LABEL: 0xDA9
STRING: The extensive and detailed data was still being updated until just a few hours ago.

LABEL: 0xDFB
STRING: And because of that...

LABEL: 0xE6E
STRING: 「What the hell was happening on that ship...?」

LABEL: 0xEA2
STRING: Numerical data wasn't the only thing Katagiri had sent.

LABEL: 0xEE4
STRING: There were audio recordings from within the ship.

LABEL: 0xF18
STRING: Images showing a glimpse of the inside of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xF47
STRING: "He" couldn't help but be astonished...

LABEL: 0xF73
STRING: ...By the scenes projected on the monitor, by the devastation.

LABEL: 0xFA7
STRING: While it wasn't a suspicious message, the contents were indeed bizarre.

LABEL: 0xFFD
STRING: ――How on earth was the <SHEEP III> able to contact the surface?

LABEL: 0x1052
STRING: ――Why was "he" contacted?

LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: Why was it Katagiri Hitose who contacted "him" in the first place?

LABEL: 0x10C8
STRING: Katagiri's name was not on the passenger list.

LABEL: 0x10F0
STRING: How did Katagiri get that data?

LABEL: 0x112A
STRING: Perhaps they were on board the <SHEEP III> after all...

LABEL: 0x1167
STRING: "He" tightened his grip on the steering wheel.

LABEL: 0x1193
STRING: On the maiden voyage of that prestigious submarine that they had built...

LABEL: 0x11DD
STRING: ...Why had the unexpected happened?

LABEL: 0x1219
STRING: "His" doubts only grew in number.

LABEL: 0x123B
STRING: Of course, "he" understood it was no use thinking about it now.

LABEL: 0x128D
STRING: "He" understood that, but――

LABEL: 0x130C
STRING: "He" checked the digital clock inside the car.

LABEL: 0x134D
STRING: In this cold and calm weather, even the sound of "his" car's engine was absorbed by the vast sea.

LABEL: 0x13A9
STRING: Looking to "his" right, he could see a row of white windmills rising out of the sea in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x13F1
STRING: The windmills were arranged according to a complex design "he" had no understanding of.

LABEL: 0x143F
STRING: Almost like a grove of trees, except in reality, it was a perfectly designed artificial island.

LABEL: 0x14A1
STRING: ――Th○○F○○○○○○○○○, at the <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0x14CD
STRING: That was how the message from Katagiri Hitose had concluded.

LABEL: 0x150F
STRING: The <Isle of Wind>... It was a name "he" was familiar with.

LABEL: 0x1555
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x156D
STRING: Why, after all this time, did it come up now?

LABEL: 0x1597
STRING: To "him," Kurama Bay and the <Isle of Wind> were things of the past.

LABEL: 0x15DD
STRING: They were supposed to be.

LABEL: 0x15FB
STRING: But "he" still remembered.

LABEL: 0x161B
STRING: The night of "The Fourth Day."

LABEL: 0x163D
STRING: That night might've been a night just like this.

LABEL: 0x1677
STRING: A dark, ominous sky and a sea so calm it sent chills down your spine...

LABEL: 0x16C9
STRING: Were all these things just a coincidence?

LABEL: 0x16F1
STRING: Or had Katagiri Hitose anticipated this...?

LABEL: 0x1725
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x173F
STRING: ...In the end,

LABEL: 0x175B
STRING: no matter how many similarities there were, they were no more than that.

LABEL: 0x17A1
STRING: It would not repeat itself.

LABEL: 0x17D1
STRING: The corners of "his" mouth loosened involuntarily.

LABEL: 0x17F1
STRING: There was no relation whatsoever...

LABEL: 0x1811
STRING: "He" exhaled as if to shake off the delusional thoughts inside his mind.

LABEL: 0x1853
STRING: But somewhere in the back of "his" mind, he knew.

LABEL: 0x188B
STRING: That "The Fourth Day" was not over yet.

LABEL: 0x18BD
STRING: Everything started on "The Fourth Day."

LABEL: 0x195C
STRING: "He" could see a line of lights in front of him to the right.

LABEL: 0x198A
STRING: It was the Aqualine that ran across Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x19B6
STRING: A bridge of light extending over the sea.

LABEL: 0x19D4
STRING: Now sealed off, the place where it all began.

LABEL: 0x1A08
STRING: It would be impossible to ask them to continue operating as usual with everything going on.

LABEL: 0x1A5E
STRING: Surely Katagiri had anticipated that as well.

LABEL: 0x1A92
STRING: The place where "he" should go, the location Katagiri specified, was not across the Aqualine.

LABEL: 0x1AEA
STRING: The car passed the bridge on the right and continued along the bay.

LABEL: 0x1B91
STRING: Eventually...

LABEL: 0x1BA7
STRING: The car drew close to the forest of windmills in the distance.

LABEL: 0x1BDF
STRING: Their blades were spinning endlessly in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x1C74
STRING: The red lights at the base of the blades were flashing in unison.

LABEL: 0x1CC2
STRING: The harmony was reminiscent of an improvised musical, to which "he" was unable to give words to.

LABEL: 0x1D1A
STRING: "He" parked the car along the bay and stepped out.

LABEL: 0x1D50
STRING: This was the place Katagiri Hitose specified. A beach facing the <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0x1DA4
STRING: The <Isle of Wind> wasn't designed to be accessed by people, so there was no bridge leading to it or boats going there.

LABEL: 0x1E10
STRING: The beach was silent, and the time peaceful.

LABEL: 0x1E36
STRING: As he slowly walked forward, you couldn't hear anything besides "his" footsteps.

LABEL: 0x1E84
STRING: "He" surveyed the surroundings but couldn't see a single person in the distance.

LABEL: 0x1EC2
STRING: "He" was looking out toward the sea, naturally.

LABEL: 0x1F4B
STRING: The <Isle of Wind> loomed ahead, irrhythmically marking the passage of time.

LABEL: 0x1F81
STRING: A large research vessel was floating in the water about a kilometer offshore.

LABEL: 0x1FEA
STRING: It was almost four in the morning.

LABEL: 0x200E
STRING: If that message was real...

LABEL: 0x203A
STRING: ――At that time.

LABEL: 0x2054
STRING: "He" saw it.

LABEL: 0x2096
STRING: "He" let out a voice without realizing it.

LABEL: 0x20B4
STRING: Not like there was anyone else there to hear it.

LABEL: 0x20DE
STRING: There was no one... No.

LABEL: 0x2104
STRING: Unless "he" mistook that for something else...

LABEL: 0x2128
STRING: "He" returned to the car, pulled out a pair of night vision binoculars from the passenger seat, and peered through them.

LABEL: 0x2180
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x219C
STRING: A single figure was floating in the sea.

LABEL: 0x21CA
STRING: That was――

LABEL: 0x21E2
STRING: A survivor from the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x2209
STRING: They were wearing a diving suit, so "he" couldn't tell who they were.

LABEL: 0x2241
STRING: Combined with the darkness, you couldn't even tell if they were a man or a woman.

LABEL: 0x2283
STRING: But it was a person for certain.

LABEL: 0x22A9
STRING: ――They turned their head toward the beach.

LABEL: 0x22CF
STRING: Had they noticed "him"?

LABEL: 0x22F3
STRING: And as if asking for help...

LABEL: 0x231B
STRING: They raised their hand――

LABEL: 0x238E
STRING: At the same time――

LABEL: 0x23A4
STRING: There was a sound.

LABEL: 0x23C2
STRING: "He" thought he heard something.

LABEL: 0x23E2
STRING: It was Katagiri Hitose's voice.

LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: 「You have to rescue her... Hurry!」

LABEL: 0x242C
STRING: 「She's――」

LABEL: 0x2448
STRING: Katagiri Hitose――

LABEL: 0x24BF
STRING: "He" tried to respond to the voice.

LABEL: 0x24ED
STRING: At that moment.

LABEL: 0x2501
STRING: A light captured "his" eyes, and then――

LABEL: 0x260F
STRING: 「――A few days ago on August 1st at 14:00,

LABEL: Custom1
STRING: <SHEEP> left the coast of Kurama Bay

LABEL: 0x264E
STRING: and lost contact with the communications room at 17:05 the same day.」

LABEL: 0x26BE
STRING: 「Then, due to an accident of unknown cause,

LABEL: 0x26E5
STRING: contact with the surface was completely cut off.」

LABEL: 0x2746
STRING: 「The next day, at around 13:00 on the 2nd,

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: communications were temporarily restored.

LABEL: 0x2772
STRING: Means to make contact was searched for,

LABEL: Custom6
STRING: but accurate location information couldn't be obtained.

LABEL: 0x27AF
STRING: Shortly after, communications were cut off again.」

LABEL: 0x280E
STRING: 「At around 20:00 on the same day,

LABEL: Custom7
STRING: Typhoon No.11 hit the mainland

LABEL: 0x2839
STRING: and the search had to be temporarily suspended.

LABEL: 0x2860
STRING: At 4:14 on August 4th, 12 minutes after receiving a call from

LABEL: 0x2894
STRING: inside the submarine,

LABEL: Custom9
STRING: a rescue team arrived at the Kurama Bay Aqualine

LABEL: 0x28C3
STRING: and rescued the survivors.」

LABEL: 0x2920
STRING: 「There were two survivors.

LABEL: Custom12
STRING: One was a graduate student named Katagiri Hitose.」

LABEL: 0x29AB
STRING: 「The other one was...」
